OrgName.entry: BROOMHALL CENTRE - ENGLISH AS A SECOND LANGUAGE

Desc.entry: A registered charity which provides classes in English as a Second Language and a conversation club. Students must live in Broomhall and attend an assessment day to be allocated to the correct course.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Tues-Thurs 10am-6pm (office hours); Wed 1-3pm (conversation club), please contact for details of the English classes
